name: pizza-delivery-app
description: Root project for pizza delivery microservices
author: Roshan Kumar

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:ui" "npm run start:services" "npm run start:infra" --names "UI,SERVICES,INFRA"
scripts.stop:all: concurrently "npm run stop:ui" "npm run stop:services" "npm run stop:infra" --names "UI,SERVICES,INFRA"
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:catalog" "npm run start:websocket" --names "AUTH,CATALOG,WEBSOCKET"
scripts.stop:services: concurrently "npm run stop:auth" "npm run stop:catalog" "npm run stop:websocket" --names "AUTH,CATALOG,WEBSOCKET"
scripts.start:auth: cd auth-service && docker ps -q -f name=mernpg-container >nul 2>&1 && npm run dev || (npm run start:DB && npm run dev)
scripts.start:catalog: cd "catalog service" && docker ps -q -f name=mernmongo-container >nul 2>&1 && npm run dev || (npm run start:DB && npm run dev)
scripts.start:kong: cd docker-kong/compose && cross-env KONG_DATABASE=postgres docker-compose --profile database up
